page.title: 16Transport
page.content:
Only one main road - the A43 - passes through the study area....a busy route between Kettering/Corby and Stamford. A traffic count 21 June 1985 recorded 58 cars,22 lorries,11 vans,5 coaches, 1 service bus, and 2 motor/cycles in a fifteen minute period.(12.00-12.15) On the same day similar counts were taken at Deene.....(14.05-14.20) when 3 cars,a tractor and a van were recorded, and at Deenethorpe..(15.00- 15.15) with 2 cars being counted.
There are no bus services through the two villages, and traffic on the minor roads in the locality was light. Only the A43 possessed a steady flow of vehicles, few of which were destined for the immediate area.
